UK - the leader in The Social Evolution

Goal: Combining the (by then purely) ceremonial Open Threat of Violence system ("we must truly be the best of the best" and thus a truly inspiring example), economically efficient Vailed Threat of Violence system and socially/politically efficent (yet to come) No Threat of Violence system.
  • Self Determination: MPs accountable to the people of Brittain first (over the crown). ??? MPs elected by councils in an open vote, with a right to recall OR a newer and better way to achieve bidirectional accountability control over special interests ???
  • Security: Presenting No Threat of Violence instead of Open Threat of Violence to foreign nations
  • Prosperity: Greatly improved trade relations with the resf of the world
  • Positive Long Term Outlook: The respected global thought leadership, most efficient goverance system,
  • Active External Forces: Everybody and their uncle.
